posts.title: Invernadero

posts._title: Piotr Studzinski – Twarz AKA The Face (1966) (HD)
posts.title: Twarz
posts.excerpt: Portrait of an artist as a young manic. First, a montage of still photographs of an artist’s face. Then motion. He stirs in sleep; he paints and expresses frustration. He looks for a light for his cigarette. He sketches, wads it up; makes tea; stares at his face in a mirror, then looks at canvas …

posts._title: Andrzej Wajda – Eine Liebe in Deutschland AKA A Love in Germany (1983)
posts.title: Eine Liebe in Deutschland
posts.excerpt: Plot In May of 1983, a man turns 49 and, with his 17-year old son, journeys to the village in Baden that he left 40 years before.
